summary: In this war drama blurring the lines between documentary and fiction, the working class and the bourgeoisie of 19th century Paris are interviewed and covered on television, before and during a tragic workers' class revolt.
cast: Eliane Annie Adalto|Pierre Barbieux|Bernard Bombeau|Maylis Bouffartigue|Geneviève Capy|Anne Carlier|Véronique Couzon|Piotr Daskiewicz|Nicole Defer|Patrick Dell'Isola|Jürgen Ellinghaus|Caroline Esnard-Benoit|Roland Fontaine|Przermyslaw Galkiewicz|Jean-Michel Gallois|Joachim Gatti|Jean Giacinti|Virginie Guibbaud|Armelle Hounkanin|Catherine Humbert|Steve Kreisler|Lucette Labreuil|Michel Labreuil|Rémy Le Champion|Jean Legal|Elisabeth Lemaitre|Gaston Lepage|Manon Lepage|Micheline Letourneur|Béatrice Mandelbrot|Elsy Mandelbrot|Leila Mandelbrot|Tilly Mandelbrot|Samy Nogaro|Laurent Parisi|Aurélia Petit|Flora Pierre|Marek Przbyla|Laurent Roth|Prune Sauvageot|Pascal Schiltz|Dirk Sikorski|Zinedine Vergnaud|Gérard Watkins|Philippe Welsh|François Damiens
keywords: year 1871|army vs civilians|paris france|suppression|shot to death
title: La commune (Paris, 1871)
